original_text: And these were of the father of Etam; Jezreel, and Ishma, and Idbash: and the name of their sister was Hazelelponi:
korean_text: 에담 조상의 자손들은 이스르엘과 이스마와 잇바스와 그들의 매제 하술렐보니와

sentences.original_text: And these were of the father of Etam;
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 이들은 에탐의 아버지에게서 난 사람들이며,

sentences.original_text: and the name of their sister was Hazelelponi:
